content: You just gave the formula for what I tried to convey today as well…there is so much joy in finding that others synch up to similar ideas!! It’s worth mentioning that there will be others who are deeply angered by the mere suggestion of self-responsibility and they will try to bring you down if you exude this mastery of self, but it won’t matter. They have no power to destroy your inner peace and eventually, they turn around and ask what you are doing to be so content! Great read!
